mapper.select: SELECT l.`cp_id` FROM bms.bd_class_plan l WHERE l.`cp_date`>=date_format(date_sub(NOW(), interval 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') and l.`course_id` IN (SELECT c.`course_id` FROM bms.bd_learn_info bli LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession bup ON bup.`pfsn_id` = bli.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_test_group g ON bup.`group_id` = g.`group_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_tg t ON t.`group_id` = g.`group_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_test_subject b ON b.`subject_id` = t.`subject_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_course c ON ( c.`test_subject` = b.`subject_id` AND c.`year` = bup.`year` ) WHERE bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId} AND c.`course_type`='FD' AND c.`course_id` IS NOT NULL AND bli.`std_stage` IN ('1','2', '3','4') GROUP BY c.`course_id`) GROUP BY l.`cp_id` ORDER BY l.`start_time`

SELECT b.`subject_id` FROM bms.bd_learn_info bli LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession bup ON bup.`pfsn_id` = bli.`pfsn_id` left join bms.bd_test_group g on bup.`group_id` = g.`group_id` left join bms.bd_tg t on t.`group_id` = g.`group_id` left join bms.bd_test_subject b on b.`subject_id` = t.`subject_id` WHERE bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId}

select re.`user_id` from bms.bd_learn_info bli left join bms.bd_student_info re on re.`std_id` = bli.`std_id` where bli.`pfsn_id` in (select u.`pfsn_id` from bms.bd_course r left join bms.bd_plan_course p on p.`course_id` = r.`course_id` left join bms.bd_teach_plan t on p.`thp_id` = t.`thp_id` left join bms.bd_unvs_profession u on u.`pfsn_id` = t.`pfsn_id` where r.`course_id` = #{courseId} group by u.`pfsn_id`) and bli.`std_stage` = #{stdStage} and re.`user_id` is not null group by re.`user_id`

SELECT re.`user_id` FROM bms.bd_learn_info bli LEFT JOIN bms.bd_student_info re ON re.`std_id` = bli.`std_id` WHERE bli.`pfsn_id` IN (SELECT u.`pfsn_id` FROM bms.bd_course r LEFT JOIN bms.bd_test_subject b ON b.`subject_id` = r.`test_subject` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_tg t ON t.`subject_id` = b.`subject_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_test_group g ON g.`group_id` = t.`group_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession u ON u.`group_id` = g.`group_id` WHERE r.`course_id` = #{courseId} AND r.`grade` = u.`grade` GROUP BY u.`pfsn_id`) AND bli.`std_stage` = #{stdStage} AND re.`user_id` IS NOT NULL GROUP BY re.`user_id`

select r.`course_name` courseName, o.`address`, c.`cp_date` cpDate, DATE_FORMAT(c.`start_time`,'%H:%i') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(c.`end_time`,'%H:%i') endTime, r.`course_id` courseId, c.`cp_type` cpType from bms.`bd_class_plan` c left join bms.bd_course r on r.`course_id` = c.`course_id` left join bms.oa_campus o on o.`campus_id` = c.`place_id` where to_days(c.`cp_date`) = to_days(now()) and DATE_FORMAT(c.`start_time`, '%H:%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTimePre}, '%H:%i') and DATE_FORMAT(c.`end_time`, '%H:%i') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTimePre}, '%H:%i') and r.`course_type` = #{courseType} and c.cp_type in('1','2','5','6') group by c.`cp_id`
select l.`qingshu_id` qingshuId, l.`qingshu_pwd` qingshuPwd, l.`school_roll` schoolRoll, l.`unvs_id` unvsId from bms.bd_learn_info l where l.`learn_id` = #{learnId}
select grade from bms.bd_learn_info where learn_id = #{learnId}

select bup.`pfsn_code` pfsnCode, bup.`pfsn_name` pfsnName, bup.`pfsn_level` pfsnLevel, bu.unvs_name unvsName, bli.grade grade from bms.bd_learn_info bli left join bms.bd_unvs_profession bup on bup.`pfsn_id` = bli.`pfsn_id` left join bms.bd_university bu on bu.unvs_id = bli.unvs_id where bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId}

SELECT l.`cp_id` FROM bms.bd_class_plan l WHERE l.`course_id` IN (SELECT c.`course_id` FROM bms.bd_course c LEFT JOIN bms.bd_plan_course p ON p.`course_id` = c.`course_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_teach_plan t ON t.`thp_id` = p.`thp_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession f ON f.`pfsn_id` = t.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_learn_info bli ON bli.`pfsn_id` = f.`pfsn_id` WHERE t.`semester` = #{term} AND bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId} GROUP BY c.`course_id`) GROUP BY l.`cp_id` ORDER BY l.`start_time`

SELECT bcr.`resource_id`, bcr.`resource_name`, bcr.`resource_type`, bcr.`course_id` FROM bms.bd_course_resource bcr LEFT JOIN bms.bd_course bc ON bcr.`course_id` = bc.`course_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_plan_course bpc ON bc.`course_id` = bpc.`course_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_teach_plan btp ON bpc.`thp_id` = btp.`thp_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession bup ON btp.`pfsn_id` = bup.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_student_admit bsa ON bup.`pfsn_id` = bsa.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_learn_info bli ON bsa.`learn_id` = bli.`learn_id` left join bms.bd_student_info bsi on bsi.`std_id` = bli.`std_id` WHERE bli.`std_stage` = '7' AND bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId} ORDER BY bcr.`update_time`

SELECT bcr.`resource_id`, bcr.`resource_name`, bcr.`resource_type`, bcr.`course_id` FROM bms.bd_course_resource bcr LEFT JOIN bms.bd_course bc ON bcr.`course_id` = bc.`course_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_plan_course bpc ON bc.`course_id` = bpc.`course_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_teach_plan btp ON bpc.`thp_id` = btp.`thp_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession bup ON btp.`pfsn_id` = bup.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_student_admit bsa ON bup.`pfsn_id` = bsa.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_learn_info bli ON bsa.`learn_id` = bli.`learn_id` left join bms.bd_student_info bsi on bsi.`std_id` = bli.`std_id` WHERE bli.`std_stage` = '2' AND bli.`std_stage` = '3' AND bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId} ORDER BY bcr.`update_time`
SELECT bli.`std_stage` FROM bms.bd_learn_info bli WHERE bli.`std_stage` in ('2','3','7','1','4') AND bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId}

mapper.select: SELECT temp_t.cp_id FROM ( (SELECT l.`cp_id`,l.cp_date,l.`start_time` FROM bms.bd_class_plan l WHERE ((DATE_FORMAT(l.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(l.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) OR DATE_FORMAT(l.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) AND l.`course_id` IN (SELECT c.`course_id` FROM bms.bd_learn_info bli LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession bup ON bup.`pfsn_id` = bli.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_test_group g ON bup.`group_id` = g.`group_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_tg t ON t.`group_id` = g.`group_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_test_subject b ON b.`subject_id` = t.`subject_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_course c ON ( c.`test_subject` = b.`subject_id` AND c.`grade` = bli.`grade` ) WHERE bli.learn_id = #{learnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.`course_id` IS NOT NULL AND bli.`std_stage` IN ('2', '3') GROUP BY c.`course_id`) GROUP BY l.`cp_id` ORDER BY l.`start_time`) UNION ALL (SELECT l.`cp_id`,l.cp_date,l.`start_time` FROM bms.bd_class_plan l WHERE ((DATE_FORMAT(l.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')<=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(l.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) OR DATE_FORMAT(l.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')) and l.`course_id` IN (SELECT c.`course_id` FROM bms.bd_course c LEFT JOIN bms.bd_plan_course p ON p.`course_id` = c.`course_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_teach_plan t ON t.`thp_id` = p.`thp_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_unvs_profession f ON f.`pfsn_id` = t.`pfsn_id` LEFT JOIN bms.bd_learn_info bli ON bli.`pfsn_id` = f.`pfsn_id` WHERE bli.`learn_id` = #{learnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY c.`course_id`) GROUP BY l.`cp_id` ORDER BY l.`start_time`)) temp_t ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(temp_t.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ASC LIMIT 1;

SELECT bc.`cp_date` cpDate, DATE_FORMAT(bc.`start_time`, '%H:%i') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(bc.`end_time`, '%H:%i') endTime, bco.`course_name` courseName, bc.`cp_type` cpType, o.`address` FROM bms.bd_class_plan bc LEFT JOIN bms.bd_course bco ON bco.`course_id` = bc.`course_id` LEFT JOIN bms.oa_campus o ON o.`campus_id` = bc.`place_id` WHERE bc.`cp_id` = #{cpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1;
